info.title: Intuety API
info.description:
## Typescript Node.JS REST API Server, leveraging TypeORM. 
 ### Key conventions: 
- RESTful conventions should be observed wherever possible
- Paths are in camelCase
- JSON body parameters should be in camelCase

 ## Postman Collection
[**Download**](spec.json) 

 [Instructions for importing OpenAPI v3 collection into Postman](https://learning.postman.com/docs/getting-started/importing-and-exporting-data/)

get.summary: Return the API Version being accessed

200.description: The current version of the API is returned.
Successful operation, returns count of users and user data.

400.description: Invalid input, error message is returned.

post.description: Returns the count and data of user logins within the specified date range for a client

startDate.description: Start date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

endDate.description: End date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

200.description: Successful operation, returns count of logins and login data.

400.description: Invalid input, error message is returned.

post.description: Returns the count and data of invites within the specified date range for a client

startDate.description: Start date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

endDate.description: End date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

200.description: Successful operation, returns count of invites and invite data

400.description: Invalid input, error message is returned

startDate.description: Start date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

endDate.description: End date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

200.description: Successful operation, returns count of projects and project data

400.description: Invalid input, error message is returned

startDate.description: Start date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

endDate.description: End date for the metrics (ISO8601 format)

200.description: Successful operation, returns count of collaborators and collaborator data

400.description: Invalid input, error message is returned
